architecture.cpu: 16 bits CPU with an accumulator based architecture

PC.name: program counter
PC.function: Holds the memory address of the next instruction to be fetched

IR.name: instruction register
IR.function: Holds the instruction which is just about to be executed

AR.name: address register
AR.function: Holds the address of the location to be accessed from memory

AC.name: accumulator
AC.function: Main processor register. It contains the results of the various operations

CCR.name: condition code Register
CCR.function: Contains different flags that indicate the status of any operation

SP.name: stack pointer
SP.function: Stores the address of the last program request in a stack
